bootstrapBoth(address,address,address,ad.details: This function should be called by the owners of both contracts (can be same owner).      IMPORTANT: The owner must first call setTrustedBootstrapper(address(this)) on both contracts      before calling this function. This allows the bootstrapper to call enableGovernanceMode.      After the first enableGovernanceMode call, ownership is transferred, but both trustedBootstrapper      are already set, so the second call will succeed.

params.timelock: Address of the TimelockController (or Safe multisig)

bootstrapFeeDistributor(address,address,.details: This function should be called by the owner of FeeDistributor.      IMPORTANT: The owner must first call setTrustedBootstrapper(address(this)) on FeeDistributor      before calling this function. This allows the bootstrapper to call enableGovernanceMode.

params.timelock: Address of the TimelockController (or Safe multisig)

bootstrapInteraction(address,address,add.details: This function should be called by the owner of Interaction.      IMPORTANT: The owner must first call setTrustedBootstrapper(address(this)) on Interaction      before calling this function. This allows the bootstrapper to call enableGovernanceMode.

params.timelock: Address of the TimelockController (or Safe multisig)

bootstrapBoth(address,address,address,ad.notice: Bootstrap both contracts in one transaction
